snippet: Trying to gain leniency, the convicted private said that he had not understood the “broader effects” of his actions, but that he did so now.
abstract: Pfc Bradley Manning, who is facing up to 90 years in prison for leaking 700,000 government files to WikiLeaks, apologizes at his court-martial trial, saying he now realizes that what he did was wrong.
lead_paragraph: Trying to gain leniency, the convicted private said that he had not understood the “broader effects” of his actions, but that he did so now.

headline.main: Manning, Facing Prison for Leaks, Apologizes at Court-Martial Trial
headline.print_headline: Manning, Facing Prison for Leaks, Apologizes at Court-Martial Trial

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
